about_the_game:
All Proceeds to Benefit Indie Game Academy Scholarships

Rapid Eye Madness is built and maintained by Team Moonstorm, which was started as part of the Indie Game Academy's Level 3 program. All proceeds for the game go directly to future IGA scholarships - help other devs learn the ropes of the industry in IGA's generous programs!

Intro

Each Screen a Challenge, Each Eye a Threat

Think fast and adapt in this short collection of horror themed micro-games sure to keep you on your toes. You must win to survive against a Cthulhu Mythos inspired demigod of mysterious origin. Discover the stories of victims before you, run through the pixelated mayhem, and peel back the mystery that is Rapid Eye Madness.

Story

Stream the Unfathomable

The eldritch gods delight in perversion above all else. They take the forms of that which are the most valuable to us, and corrupt it for their tormentful liking. So what happens when our gods change? How does the eerie respond once we start worshiping idols not made of stone, but displayed on our screens? You might just have the misfortune to find out. Step into the seat of the Fate-Viewer, and witness the horrors a god can deliver for its audience. For as long as you keep watching, the terror continues. Will you manage to break this stream of suffering, or fall victim to the trance media?

Gameplay and Features

Rapid Eye Madness has microgames in 2 styles: top-down player movement and quick-time puzzle events. You are given a simple clue before each microgame starts, then only a few seconds to accomplish each task. You might be avoiding a monster, locking the correct door, tossing a cult-member into the abyss... whatever the tentacled TV monster requires of you.

At launch, we have 10 unique microgames served up in random order. Team Moonstorm has plans for many more to come!

As you complete each run, you'll unlock secrets that expose the details of the player's captivity. Read along or play these audio logs aloud for some bone-chilling tales of despair!

short_description: Rapid Eye Madness is a short grim & cute collection of mini-games that are as cryptic as they are engaging. Venture into the eldritch nightmare, and stream for your life as you solve the challenges the screens throw at you. Will you survive this eerie gamescape, or become another one of its victims?
